name: Twisted Memories - DEMO
description:
Our dynamic duo is back in this sequel to The Darkest Timeline, but this time play as either Blue Moose or Red Neph. Both have been left behind and are looking for something to fill the lonely void in their hearts. Will they be able to quell the sadness in their hearts or will their actions just lead them down a darker path of self destruction?

Find Moose here:

https://twitter.com/ThatDernMoose

Find Neph here:

https://www.nephalope.com/

Music & Sound provided by:

winepot.

https://linktr.ee/winepot

Play The Darkest Timeline here: 

https://mc-moose.itch.io/darkest-timeline
